cleaned_text: Chinese Medicine Review Journals [Chinese Medicine](https://alternativemedicine.alliedacademies.com/) is an open access journal publishing evidence-based, scientifically justified research and review papers in all aspects of [Chinese medicine](https://familynursing.alliedacademies.com/), including - but not limited to - chemistry, [biology](https://www.alliedacademies.org/archives-of-general-internal-medicine/), pharmacology, [pharmaceutics](https://alternativemedicine.alliedacademies.com/), engineering, clinical applications and [socioeconomics](https://www.alliedacademies.com/) that are relevant and significant to [Chinese medicine](https://www.alliedacademies.org/). Peer-review is the system used to assess the quality of a manuscript before it is published. Independent researchers in the relevant research area assess submitted manuscripts for originality, validity and significance to help editors determine whether the manuscript should be published in their journal. [Traditional chinese medicine](https://alternativemedicine.alliedacademies.com/) practitioners use [herbal medicines](https://www.alliedacademies.org/archives-of-general-internal-medicine/) and various mind and body practices, such as [acupuncture](https://www.alliedacademies.com/) and tai chi, to treat or prevent [health](https://www.alliedacademies.org/) problems.
